Smead’s Expanding File Box is designed to help you organize large amounts of paperwork that need to be transported quickly or file material without a file cabinet. Contains 15% recycled content and 15% post-consumer material. • A Rich Heritage of Innovation and Quality. A world-leading provider of solutions for efficient document management, Smead is a woman-owned company well-known for its high quality, environmentally responsible products and innovative organizational systems.
